instructions: Please take a few minutes to go through the advertisements in this book. Please take as much time with each ad as you care to. If you ordinarily wear reading glasses, you'll need them. AND RESPONDENT PORTFOLIO AND TAKE IT BACK BEFORE CONTINUING. Now, I'd like to ask you a few questions about the ads in the book.

questions.question: What brands or products do you remember seeing ads for in the book?
questions.note: DO NOT READ EITHER BRAND NAMES OR PRODUCT CATEGORIES.

questions.question: Do you remember any ads for cigarettes?

additional_notes: IF NO CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED ABOVE ASK Q.3.
IF ONLY ONE OR TWO CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED SKIP TO Q.3b.
IF ALL THREE CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED SKIP TO Q.4.
IF TRUE MENTIONED IN Q.2, 3 OR 3b CONTINUE.
IF TRUE NOT MENTIONED IN Q.2, 3 OR 3b SKIP TO Q.10.
